channel.title: Comments on: “Reinventing Smalltalk, one decade at a Time”

item.title: by: Sergio
item.description: These slides would do a 1000% better with a podcast, a la O'Reilly. Anyone recording there?
item.content:encoded: These slides would do a 1000% better with a podcast, a la O’Reilly. Anyone recording there?

item.title: by: Anonymous
item.description:
Modest hardware running Perl can easily saturate your bandwidth

Surely the quote refers to Perl as a server side scripting language serving data very quickly.
item.content:encoded:
Modest hardware running Perl can easily saturate your bandwidth

Surely the quote refers to Perl as a server side scripting language serving data very quickly.
